title: Portfolio
profile_description_1: I am a backend developer with two years of experience in Java and Spring Boot, specializing in the design and development of scalable web applications and RESTful services. Throughout my career, I have worked with both monolithic and microservices architectures, designing efficient and scalable systems while prioritizing clean and documented code, following best practices to ensure sustainable long-term development.
profile_description_2: Recently, I have expanded my knowledge into the DevOps field to better understand the full software development lifecycle, from coding to deployment. I am acquiring skills in Docker and Kubernetes for container management and orchestration, as well as automating CI/CD pipelines to facilitate continuous integration and delivery.
profile_description_3: I have started working with cloud platforms such as Azure, where I have deployed and managed services in cloud environments. My goal is to integrate cloud-based solutions into future projects to build highly scalable and resilient systems.
profile_description_4: I am focused on continuing to specialize in the design of microservices-based systems and implementing automated solutions that optimize both the quality and efficiency of software. I am motivated to collaborate in dynamic teams and participate in innovative projects, while continuously learning and staying up to date with the latest technological advancements.
experience_1_task_1: Develop and implement web applications and RESTful services for machine translation and natural language processing.
experience_1_task_2: Designed and implemented a distributed system with RESTful services developed in Java Spring Boot and Python scripts dedicated to document translation using neural machine translation models.
experience_1_task_3: Developed the logic for a language learning platform for the University of Santiago de Compostela, implementing a dynamic evaluation system with progressively difficult exercises. The use of PostgreSQL, required by the client, posed an additional challenge for the flexible structure of these exercises.
experience_1_task_4: Migrated legacy applications to Java Spring Boot using reverse engineering techniques.
experience_1_task_5: Introduced continuous integration with GitLab CI, implementing a pipeline to optimize project delivery processes.
experience_1_task_6: Planned and estimated technical tasks to improve project management efficiency.
experience_2_task_1: Collaborated in the digital modernization of the Andalusian Digital Agency, working on complex web applications with an extensive data domain.
experience_2_task_2: Developed applications with Spring Boot Java, both in monolithic and microservices architectures, and implemented SOA solutions. Also, used Python for task automation, optimizing processes.
experience_2_task_3: Deployed applications in WildFly and managed version control using GitFlow, improving deployment pipelines and version management.
experience_2_task_4: Enhanced time management skills by breaking down complex tasks into concrete steps, ensuring timely deliveries.
experience_2_task_5: Mentored junior developers, reviewing code and providing technical support, strengthening leadership and communication skills.
experience_3_task_1: Developed the internal communication system for the Andalusian Government with Java, JPA, and Spring for the backend, and JavaScript and HTML for the frontend.
experience_3_task_2: Resolved technical user issues, ensuring the continuous operation of the system.
spring_boot_description: With Spring Boot, I have developed scalable microservices and monolithic applications, utilizing dependency injection, Spring Data JPA, and Spring Security for secure and modular solutions. I have also integrated Spring Cloud for cloud-native architectures and used Maven as a project manager.
node_js_description: I worked with Node.js, Express.js, and Mongoose during my final degree project, developing web applications and APIs. I plan to further explore Node.js in the future.
java_description: Specialized in backend development with Java, I have worked with multiple versions of the language, optimizing performance and designing REST APIs with Object-Oriented Programming.
python_description: I used Python for scripting, automation, and neural networks, working with libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Pandas, and NumPy.
javascript_description: I created dynamic web applications with JavaScript and TypeScript, enhancing user experience across different platforms.
html5_description: I used HTML5 to structure web application content, applying proper semantics to improve accessibility, SEO, and code maintainability.
css3_description: I employed CSS3 to design and style user interfaces, creating attractive and responsive user experiences using modern techniques like Flexbox and Grid for adaptability across devices of different resolutions.
thymeleaf_description: I integrated Thymeleaf as a template engine in Spring applications, facilitating dynamic content generation in the interface, maintaining a clear separation between business logic and presentation, and improving the efficiency of page rendering.
mysql_description: I designed database schemas and optimized complex queries in MySQL for high-performance applications.
oracle_description: I managed databases with Oracle, working with complex schemas and advanced queries.
postgresql_description: I created scalable databases with PostgreSQL, focusing on performance and data integrity.
mongodb_description: I designed NoSQL solutions with MongoDB for unstructured data, optimizing queries and scalability.
git_description: I managed repositories and branches with Git, implementing Gitflow to structure branching and automate processes.
subversion_description: I maintained code repositories with Subversion in legacy projects.
gitlab_ci_description: I automated integration and deployment pipelines with GitLab CI/CD.
github_actions_description: I configured GitHub Actions to automate testing and deployments in personal projects.
docker_description: I containerized applications with Docker to ensure consistency across environments and optimize local development.
kubernetes_description: I orchestrated dockerized applications with Kubernetes, improving scalability and resource management.
junit_description: I developed unit tests with JUnit, automating them within the build pipeline.
selenium_description: I automated integration tests for web applications with Selenium WebDriver.
jmeter_description: I performed load testing with JMeter, evaluating application performance and generating detailed reports.
azure_description: I learned Microsoft Azure concepts to integrate and deploy services in the cloud.
github_description: I used GitHub to host repositories and configure CI/CD pipelines in personal projects.
gitlab_description: I managed repositories and CI/CD pipelines in professional projects with GitLab.
jira_description: I used Jira to log the hours worked on each task, manage the task status throughout the project lifecycle, and generate periodic progress reports, ensuring deadlines were met as planned.
easyredmine_description: With Easy Redmine, I managed the time spent on each task by assigning hours and tracking progress. I also set up progress reports to ensure projects remained on schedule.
bash_description: I automated tasks with Bash/Shell, managing configurations and deployments on Linux systems like Ubuntu and CentOS.
postman_description: I used Postman to test, debug, and automate API testing, ensuring that endpoints met functional and performance requirements before deployment.
course_1_title: Spring Boot Microservices with Spring Cloud
course_4_title: Angular & NodeJS - The MEAN Stack Guide
certification_2_title: CCNA2: Switching, Routing, and Wireless Essentials
